nodes.text: Relative Difficulties was a short roleplaying adventure seed that was included as an example of a quest adventure in West End Games' Star Wars Gamemaster Screen. In the adventure, one of the player characters discovers he has a twin brother, the Imperial Advisor Gam Rothwall, and endeavours to meet him on the artice world of Garnib. On the planet, Rothwall is the target of an assassination attempt by an Anti-Imperial group since he was responsible for the execution of several Galactic Crystal Creations officials.
